long_description: The Perfect Pitch Washers game lets you spend hours of outdoor fun with family and friends-perfect for tailgating, barbecues, picnics, reunions and back yard parties! Waterproof and weatherproof washers have a steel interior and heavy-duty plastic exterior; they don't nick, chip or splinter like traditional wooden washers. Targets nest together for easy, compact storage and transport and can be filled with sand or water for interesting variations of game play. Perfect Pitch Washers game comes with 2 targets, 4 blue washers, 4 red washers, storage bag and instructions.
short_description: The Perfect Pitch Washers game lets you spend hours of outdoor fun with family and friends-perfect for tailgating, barbecues, picnics, reunions and back yard parties!
